name: retrieve_owners
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool opensea_data_query.
Tool description: (Deprecated) Get opensea data without any api key
API description: This endpoint is used to obtain the entire list of owners for an NFT. Results will also include the quantity owned.

token_id.description: The unique identifier of the NFT.

asset_contract_address.description: The contract address of the NFT asset.

order_by.description: The field by which to sort the results. Defaults to 'created_date'.

cursor.description: An opaque value used for pagination to retrieve the next set of results. Defaults to None.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return. Defaults to '20'.

order_direction.description: The direction to sort the results, either 'asc' for ascending or 'desc' for descending. Defaults to 'desc'.
